adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the Greek city of Thebes or its inhabitants.
Relating to or characteristic of Thebes, the ancient capital of Upper Egypt.
examples: the hermit settlements of the Theban desert

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the Greek city of Thebes.
examples: the remains of poetry celebrating victories in games are dominated by a Theban

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Thebes, the ancient capital of Upper Egypt.
examples: the tombs of the private Thebans
